segments.text: We're supposed to check in at the air-china ’ s counter . Thirty minutes before take off , Joe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . The boarding time on the ticket says 17
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do we need to show our ID cards when checking in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can check it and hand carry small bags . And we have open each for inspection
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are they going to frisk all the passengers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . we certainly don ’ t want a highjack to happen on our plane today .
segments.speaker: S2
